# EpiPulse: Advancing Public Health Through Evidence and Action

EpiPulse is a public health NGO working at the intersection of epidemiology, community engagement, and implementation science. We turn health data into practical action for stronger and more equitable communities.

## What We Do

:::{.card-grid}
::: {.info-card}
### Epidemiology and Surveillance
Data-driven surveillance support, outbreak analytics, and actionable dashboards for local decision-makers.
:::

::: {.info-card}
### Non-Communicable Disease Prevention
Community interventions for diabetes, hypertension, nutrition, and behavior-risk reduction.
:::

::: {.info-card}
### Maternal, Child, and Adolescent Health
Field research and implementation support for life-course health and school/community prevention.
:::

::: {.info-card}
### Capacity Building
Workshops, mentoring, and reproducible data workflows for students, researchers, and frontline teams.
:::
:::

## Why Partners Work With EpiPulse

We combine rigorous methods with practical implementation. Our model supports governments, institutions, and communities with:

- Fast evidence synthesis for decision-making
- Ethical and equity-centered public health practice
- Cross-disciplinary teams (epidemiology, clinical, analytics, field operations)
- Transparent documentation and reproducible methods
